mean_cn: n.东西；材料；原料；  vt.把……塞进；装满
mean_en: used to refer to a substance, material, group of objects, etc. when you do not know the name, when the name is not important or when it is obvious what you are talking about
sentence: We keep all of the baby's stuff in his bedroom.
sentence_trans: 我们把孩子所有的东西都放在他的卧室里。
